name: Unstable Magnetic Gun
description:
Controls:

WASD/Arrows - movement

MOUSE - target

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot

This is a simple physics-based game where you are an android equipped with an electrizing gun. You can use it to magnetize rocks causing them to be pulled together or pushed apart. You objective is to destroy all enemies by crushing them between rocks and not get killed.

The game is unstable because its difficult to properly place enemy between rocks to kill it. You cannot directly kill enemies.

This is a bit unfinished game, we should tweak a lot more. There are multiple hacks and other problems. However the core idea is working, so… :)
